root.Summary: On the registration page, when you enter a spacebar instead symbols in the "password" field, an account is registered
root.Description: <1>Input valid data in the email, Full Name fields.</1> <2>Input 12 spacebars in the Password field </2> <3>Input 12 spacebars in the Confirm Password field </3> <4>Click the button Registration.</4>
root.Actualresult: Successful registration with the spacebars in the Password
